translation: When the wisdom-light shines through every gate of this body, then it may be known that Sattva is predominant.
commentary: 14.11 through every gate (sense)? Dehe in the body? in this in this? Light: wisdomlight? Produces shines? Knowledge knowledge? When when? Then then? Vidyat (it) may be known? enlarged (is) predominant? Sattva,Sattva? It is thus? Or indeed.Commentary When a particular ality becomes predominant? it reveals its distinctive characteristics in man. Just as jasmine scatters its fragrance far
